extendedInfo.description: TrazLibro is an alternative to the official Facebook app and also a translator.Have you ever wanted to know what your international friends are talking about on Facebook in a language that you don't understand? This is the app for you!Note1: You need to install the official Google Translate app in order to use the function. So you're advised to send comments on the translation accuracy to Google if you wanted to do so.TrazLibro is not affiliated with Facebook or Google.Note2: You need to authorize all the permissions the app requests. If you have ever removed some of the permissions, it won't work as expected. You'll need to remove the app from the account settings on Facebook and also on your device and install it once again to fix it.For users of old version earlier than 4: Unfortunately, we can no longer offer you the Bing translator unless you want to pay monthly fee for the service because they decided to make it paid service as of 1st April.[Main Features]*Translation Powered by Google(to/from 65 languages)*Groups*Bookmarking*Smooth Check-in*Tag Friends*Custom Font Displays Any Languages and Symbols*Posting Status Updates with Symbols(Emoji/Emoticon)*Fully Compatible with Jelly Bean (JB)*Fast Browsing*GPU Rendering Enabled*Rapid Update for Newsfeed by Shaking Device*Customizable Uploading Image Compression*Friends' Birthday Notification*New Messages Notification*Integrated Photo Album Viewer*Easily Like and Share from Long Tap*Image/Feed Caching*Canceling Posts[Security And Privacy]This app doesn't store your password and never collect or use your personal information accessible via Facebook. So you're always safe to use it. TrazLibro always uses HTTPS/SSL protocol to protect your data even when you are on the go.You can find complete Privacy Policy here, https://www.facebook.com/notes/trazlibro-community/privacy-policy/362936327082779[Support]In case you need assistance or are having problem with this app, Please visit the page below and leave me a comment. To keep you updated, please like the page.https://www.facebook.com/TrazLibro[Required Permissions]Internet Access ... used to access facebook and linked website, and also for ad.External Storage ... used to cache images.Fine (GPS) Location .... used to check-in.Control Vibrator ... used to notify unread messages.System Tool... used to kill Google Translate app to prevent it from draining battery.[ad-removal + extended options key]you can find TrazLibro Pro Key in the market.[Compatible Android Version]*from 2.1 to 4.0.x[Planned future updates]*messaging*searching in NewsFeed[Supported languages]Afrikaans, Albanian, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bulgarian, Catalan, Chinese_Simplified, Chinese_Traditional, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Esperanto, Estonian, Filipino, Finnish, French, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Gujarati, Haitian_Creole, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Kannada, Korean, Latvian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Malay, Maltese, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Tagalog, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese, Welsh, Yiddish[Troubleshooting]*If you experience crash too often on a legacy device, disable "Use Custom Font" which requires certain amount of memory. and also lower other settings such as cache and photos.*if you cannot login to facebook with this app, make sure you can login with the official app or default browser if you haven't installed it. once it's done, you won't be asked your password when you launch TrazLibro. Then you just need to authorize TrazLibro only once to get it working.

reviews.title: Wtf?
reviews.comment: I figured I\'d b able 2 write Happy Birthday on friends wall & it\'d come up in her language but only way I did it was posting on my wall..???? Also, I was trying app & tried 2 read 1 of her posts & it didn\'t translate! SUCKS! Unless u can tell me a better way 2 use, it\'s worthless & thank God my girl knows english. Thought it\'d b nice 2 talk in her native tongue but this app has let me down
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: I like this app but it doesn\'t always show everything that\'s been posted example it says someone liked a picture but I can\'t share it so if you can fix that that would be great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'ve 3 problem with this app 1. It doesn\'t show all my friends thing 2. I can\'t see my friends status (in written)3. where is my & my friends profile?
reviews.author: A Google User
